arts.ttl: Arkell Jude-Boyd and George Miller give Cheltenham victory over Morecambe
arts.sum: Hallam Hope wasted Morecambeâ€™s best chances.

arts.ttl: Cheltenham Town's January transfer window business up and running, says boss Michael Flynn
arts.sum: There are currently six loanees in Michael Flynn's Robins squad, but Nottingham Forest forward Manni Norkett has an ankle injury keeping him out until the new year, so he is likely to have made his final appearance for the club. Norwich City defender Lewis Shipley is also likely to depart in January, having not been picked regularly in the match day squad in recent weeks.
